title Sequence Diagram: 16 List My Events
actor "Organiser/Administrator" as a
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>:DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_><link:_>m: Model" as m
participant "<link:_>: EventRepository" as er
control "<link:_>: EventController" as es
participant "<link:_>: EventService" as ese


== 1.The organiser/administrator selects the list my events functionality ==
a->>w:click()
activate w
w->d:GET(url: String, data: JSON)

activate d
d->es:displayEvent(accountId : long, m:Model)
activate es

es->ese:getEventHistory(accountId:long)
 
activate ese

ese->er:Event[*]:=findEventsByAccountId(accountId: long)   

ese-->es:return Event[*]
deactivate ese
es->m:addAttribute("events":String ,events:Event[*])
es-->d:return "list-my-event" **(20-events-organiser/ 01-main-administrator)**
deactivate es


d->*nv:View(m:Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d


w->nv:render()
activate nv

note over nv: When loaded by the browser \njavascript anc CSS will be \nexecuted to render the page.\nThis happens in the browser.

nv-->w:
deactivate nv

== 2. The system displays all events page **(20-events-organiser/ 01-main-administrator)**\n which shows all the events  of the organiser/administrator to organiser/administrator==


== 3. The organiser/administrator selects the view event functionality to view details of an event==



a -> w: click()
activate w

w->d:GET(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->es:displayEvent(eId : long, m : Model)
activate es

es -> ese: getEvent(eId : long)
activate ese
ese->er:event := findEventByName(name : String)

ese-->es:return event
deactivate ese

es->m: addAttribute("event" : String, event : Event)

es-->d:return "check event details"**(18-check-event-organiser, 14-check-event-admin)**
deactivate es
d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d

== 4. The system displays the view event page **(18-check-event-organiser, 14-check-event-admin)**\n which shows the details of the selected event to the organizer/administrator ==
